    • Method Detail

      • initServer

        public static void initServer(String pathServerProperties,
                              String pathDatabaseProperties)
        Initializes stand-alone online map matching server (tracker). Server properties file must include matcher, server, and tracker properties, see TrackerServer.TrackerServer(Properties, RoadMap). Database properties file must include database connection properties, see Loader.roadmap(Properties, boolean).
        Parameters:
        pathServerProperties - Path to server properties file.
        pathDatabaseProperties - Path to database properties file.

      • getServer

        public static TrackerServer getServer()
        Gets TrackerServer object (singleton).
        Returns:
        TrackerServer object (singleton).

      • runServer

        public static void runServer()
        Starts/runs server.

      • stopServer

        public static void stopServer()
        Stops server.
